title: To Raise a Future General - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Ancient Times   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Farming   Female Protagonist   Poor Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Secret Identity   Transmigration
author: Hua Xie   花谢
description: After a sleep, Mi Xian, an editor in modern society, transmigrated in a book named “Minister In Power” and thereafter played a supporting role called Yang Yixian, who was nine years old. Knowing that the piteous young male lead would become an evil general in the future, she decided to bring and raise him at home.>
